name: BABABOBOS :)
wishText: On this special day, as the sun rises anew, let's celebrate your beautiful souls. Like flowers unfolding in the dawn, may you both continue to grow, radiant and free. May each moment be a joyful melody, guiding you through life's journey with love and wisdom. Happy birthday, dear Mithu and Chico! May your light shine brighter with each passing year
textInChatBox: Happy birthday mera bababobos!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special cuz you are C.N iykwim
outroText: Pasand aaya toa babs bheju aur pyar krow.
